alert.note: Alert for Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN MASON AND SOUTHWESTERN LEWIS COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Lewisburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Lewisburg, Tollesboro, Fleming-Mason Airport, Petersville, Orangeburg, Mount Gilead, Somo, Rectorville, Epworth, and Glen Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
